## Description

<p>Bodenmessdaten der automatischen Wetterstationen, automatischen Niederschlagsstationen, manuellen Niederschlagsstationen und Pollenstationen im Kanton Thurgau. </p><p></p><p>Daten in weiteren zeitlichen Granularitäten (Jahres-, Monats,- und 10-Minutenwerte) können hier bezogen werden: </p><p>https://www.meteoschweiz.admin.ch/service-und-publikationen/service/open-data.html</p><p></p><p>Datenquelle: MeteoSchweiz Kanton Thurgau</p>

## Load Packages

Every dataset (csv and geodata) on [data.tg.ch](https://data.tg.ch/pages/start/) can be retrieved with the **tgAPI** package. You can download it via [GitHub](https://github.com/ogdtg/tgAPI). Please note that the package has some dependencies, which can result in a lengthy installation process. Therefore, we do not recommend installing the package directly in Google Colab. However, if you intend to run this code on your local machine, we strongly recommend installing the tgAPI package.

```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
# library(remotes)
# remotes::install.github("ogdtg/tgAPI")

```


## Download Data


```{r}
# Download the Dataset via API
res <- httr::GET("https://data.tg.ch/api/explore/v2.0/catalog/datasets/meteoschweiz-ogd-2/exports/json")
data <- res$content %>%
  rawToChar() %>%
  jsonlite::fromJSON()

# Use tgAPI
# data <- tgAPI::get_dataset("meteoschweiz-ogd-2")

head(data)

```


## Explore Metadata

res <- httr::GET("https://data.tg.ch/api/explore/v2.0/catalog/datasets/meteoschweiz-ogd-2")

# Fields name

# Fields description
